name: Study of a Seated Young Man
description: Study of a Seated Young Man; Guercino (Giovanni Francesco Barbieri) (Italian (Bolognese), 1591 - 1666); Italy; about 1619; Black chalk dipped in gum, white chalk heightening on gray-brown paper; 52.2 x 42.7 cm (20 9/16 x 16 13/16 in.); 89.GB.52; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Study of a Seated Young Man
medium: Black chalk dipped in gum, white chalk heightening on gray-brown paper
